text: aur (yaad karo) jab ke Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne apni khaum se kaha aye meri khaum ke logo! tum mujhe kyo sata rahe ho, halaan ke tumhe (ba-qoobi) maalom hai ke main tumhaari jaanib Allah ka rasool hoon, pas jab wo log tede hee rahe, to Allah ne unke dilo ko (aur) tedha kar diya aur Allah taâ€™ala na farmaan khaum ko hidaayath nahi deta
